input.sentences: many marathon racers were in attendance today .
there was even a band playing on the sidelines !
family and friends gathered around the street to cheer for their runner .
many runners were getting tired due to the hot weather .
in the end | everyone got a little something for finishing the race .
output.sentences: The racers in the marathon were all in attendance.
There was a marching band playing on the sidelines.
The friends and family of the runners gathered on the street.
The hot weather left the runners feeling more tired than usual.
It was my job to take photos of the people finishing the race.
